name: vscode-remote-sfdx-project
description: This guide helps Salesforce developers who are new to Visual Studio Code go from zero to a deployed app using Salesforce Extensions for VS Code and Salesforce CLI.

scripts.rebuild: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && rm -rf ~/.npm && npm install
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit:apex: sfdx force:apex:test:run --loglevel DEBUG --apiversion 47.0 --codecoverage --testlevel RunLocalTests --synchronous --verbose --resultformat human || true
